name: The Cube
overview: A puzzle\brain game from Matthias Scherf, published in 64'er Sonderheft 17 and in 64'er Sonderheft 85. The Cube: Puzzles in the third dimension A first class 3D puzzle game. The Cube is a unique puzzle game of high difficulty. High demands are placed on the player in terms of spatial imagination, a far-sighted way of thinking and a great deal of patience. The gray brain cells are in demand! The aim of this game is to roll a dice of six differently designed parts. Imagine this cube made up of 3x3x3 »elementary cubes. The individual parts also consist of these elementary cubes - an extremely tricky matter, although there are various possible solutions! There are a total of three levels to master. The solution is not clear from the program. If you want, you can also create your own puzzles by manipulating the program.
